title: Hriat chianna hlu ber Isua ka ta
lyrics:
Hriat chianna hlu ber, Isua ka ta,
Van nun ropui tem lawkna hlu tak chu;
Pathianin min lei, chhandam kan ni,
Thlarauva piang, thisen sil fai chu.

Hei hi ka thu leh hla a lo ni, 2
Chhandamtu faka tlaini len hi.

Inpekna kimah, lawm a kim thin,
Hruai khawm hun tur thlir lawkna chang vein;
Zahngaihna thangkhawk, hmangaih thuruk,
Min rawn thlen ve chung van mite khian.

Inpekna kimah, muan a kim thin,
Ka Chhandamtu, ka lawmna tikimtu;
Beisei leh ringin van ka thlir a,
A hmangaih leh thatin ka lo khat.
